title: SLO Knowledge Base for MCP
description: Create TIER_DEFAULTS and DEPENDENCY_SLAS knowledge bases for recommend_slo() tool. TIER_DEFAULTS: critical/standard/best-effort × api/worker/stream → availability + latency targets. DEPENDENCY_SLAS: postgresql (99.95%, +50ms), redis (99.99%, +5ms), kafka (99.95%, +30ms), stripe-api (99.9%, +200ms), etc. calculate_max_availability() multiplies dependency SLAs. recommend_latency() sums base + dependency overhead + buffer.
